name: Sprocky
description:
Sprocky is a bundle of positive energy, searching to connect and recharge Cybernetica's many lost robots. Story

On the planet Cybernetica, home world of the Meta-Formators, a great Rust storm stirs up in wake of a cataclysmic event known as the Great Oxidation.  Born only a few Construction Cycles ago, the Formator known as Sprocky is only concerned with meeting and connecting to new friends. Incidentally, he also enjoys waking them up from a suspicious involuntary slumber.

Controls KEYBOARD GAMEPAD Move A/D Left Stick Jump Space Right Bumper Connect Arrow Keys Face Buttons Dance(!) E Left Bumper Pause ESC Start Credits Game Design & Artwork Programming & Unity Development Tali Y. Despins Kevin Moore A Curious Tea Level Design, Writing & QA Music Composition Sebastien Guanzon Akashic Owl

This game was made in 1 week for Lost Relic Games' Game Jam, June 2022.
